clearable.description: Whether to display the clear icon on the right, type = select is invalid
clearable.description_zh: 是否显示右侧的清除图标，type = select时无效

:v-model.description: Used to bind the value of the input box bidirectionally
:v-model.description_zh: 用于双向绑定输入框的值

input-align.description: The alignment of the text in the input box
input-align.description_zh: 输入框文字的对齐方式

disabled.description: Whether to disable the input field

maxlength.description: The maximum length that can be entered in the input box
maxlength.description_zh: 输入框的最大可输入长度

placeholder-style.description: placeholder的样式，字符串形式，如"color: red;"
placeholder-style.description_zh: placeholder的样式，字符串形式，如"color: red;"

confirm-type.description: Set the text of the button in the lower right corner of the keyboard to take effect only when type is text
confirm-type.description_zh: 设置键盘右下角按钮的文字，仅在type为text时生效

custom-style.description: Customize the style of the input box, the form of the object
custom-style.description_zh: 自定义输入框的样式，对象形式

focus.description: Whether or not to get focus automatically

fixed.description: If type is textarea and is in the "position:fixed" area, this parameter must be true
fixed.description_zh: 如果type为textarea，且在一个"position:fixed"的区域，需要指明为true

password-icon.description: If type is set to password, whether to display the password view icon on the right
password-icon.description_zh: type为password时，是否显示右侧的密码查看图标

border.description: Whether or not to display a border

border-color.description: The color of the border for the input box

auto-height.description: Whether to automatically increase the input area, which is valid when the type is set to textarea
auto-height.description_zh: 是否自动增高输入区域，type为textarea时有效

cursor-spacing.description: Specifies the distance between the cursor and the keyboard, in px
cursor-spacing.description_zh: 指定光标与键盘的距离，单位px

selection-start.description: Cursor start position, effective when autofocusing, needs to be used with selection-end
selection-start.description_zh: 光标起始位置，自动聚焦时有效，需与selection-end搭配使用

selection-end.description: The end of the cursor is effective when autofocusing, and needs to be used in conjunction with selection-start
selection-end.description_zh: 光标结束位置，自动聚焦时有效，需与selection-start搭配使用

trim.description: Whether to automatically remove spaces at both ends
trim.description_zh: 是否自动去除两端的空格

show-confirmbar.description: Whether to display the bar with the Done button at the top of the keyboard
show-confirmbar.description_zh: 是否显示键盘上方带有”完成“按钮那一栏

adjust-position.description: Whether the height is automatically adjusted when the keyboard is ejected
adjust-position.description_zh: 弹出键盘时是否自动调节高度
